title: Exploring Factors Influencing Mobile Learning Continuance Intention: A PBL-Based Qualitative Study

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mobile learning platform experience and completion of secondary science curriculum
context.additional_context: Provision of individual digital devices (tablets/laptops), use of online collaboration tools, and the need to strengthen adaptability to post-COVID-19 non-face-to-face learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze 15 core factors influencing mobile learning continuation intentions.
Learners can apply research methodologies from qualitative interview design to phenomenological text interpretation
Learners can propose improvements for mobile learning based on data derived from PBL projects
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
